Articles.Content: Would all KSP 1 pars be added into KSP 2 including the two expansions that came out for KSP 1?

28 minutes ago, Cloakedwand72 said:

Would all KSP 1 pars be added into KSP 2 including the two expansions that came out for KSP 1?

A lot will. It looks like we won't get robotic parts and that may also imply that all DLC parts are possibly out, but at least the big parts (engines, fuel tanks, pods, etc) will likely be in KSP2.

This is all hearsay of course based on things people said and implications of the trailer they released at PAX.

I think they confirmed in some interviews that almost all the parts from the base game will be ported to the sequel.

An exception I remember is the pre clustered engines (like the SLS one with 4 vectors) that will be replaced by a system to make custom engine clusters.

For the DLC I remember reading somewhere that they will not make it in time for the release.

43 minutes ago, Master39 said:

For the DLC I remember reading somewhere that they will not make it in time for the release.

So they are planned then? O_o

6 minutes ago, mcwaffles2003 said:

So they are planned then? O_o

I don't know, with all the interviews and the speculation I don't remember what's what.

I guess that the only thing counting, the robotics from Breaking Ground will be in some future update all the other parts and features will probably be replaced by the new parts sets.

1 hour ago, Master39 said:

I don't know, with all the interviews and the speculation I don't remember what's what.

I guess that the only thing counting, the robotics from Breaking Ground will be in some future update all the other parts and features will probably be replaced by the new parts sets.

wonder if they'll keep gimbaled SRBs

1 hour ago, mcwaffles2003 said:

wonder if they'll keep gimbaled SRBs

I believe that's actually something that was brought in to KSP1 because of discussions the KSP2 devs had with Scott Manley and others.  So it's a backported feature.
